sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './booking.css'; import { Button,Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const [ credentials , setCredentials] = useState({ userId:'01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName: '', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value})) }; const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(credentials); } const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number(price)* Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee) return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* Booking form */}
Information
${price} 1 persons
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
${totalAmount}
); }; export default Booking;
